content: Who directed the iconic 1960 horror film "Psycho," which features the infamous shower scene accompanied by screeching violin music?

The iconic 1960 horror film "Psycho" was directed by the legendary filmmaker Alfred Hitchcock. This psychological thriller is considered one of his masterpieces and has had a lasting impact on the horror genre. The film's most famous scene is undoubtedly the shower scene, where the screeching violin music, composed by Bernard Herrmann, creates an unforgettable and chilling atmosphere.
